hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="rails" published_version="5.1.4"
available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.9 (Santiago)"
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo for $PRETTY_NAME." echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
source /home/test/.bashrc # Build Ruby & install the dependencies sudo yum install -y bison openssl-devel libyaml-devel libffi-devel readline-devel zlib-devel gdbm-devel ncurses-devel tcl-devel tk-devel sqlite-devel gcc make wget tar bzip2 svn subversion gcc-c++ binutils-devel
export work_dir=`pwd` # Install Gcc 4.8.2 wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gcc/gcc-4.8.2/gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 tar xvf gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 cd gcc-4.8.2 ./contrib/download_prerequisites mkdir $work_dir/gccbuild cd $work_dir/gccbuild ../gcc-4.8.2/configure --prefix="/opt/gcc" --enable-shared --with-system-zlib --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit --enable-checking --enable-gnu-indirect-function --enable-languages="c,c++" --disable-bootstrap --disable-multilib make all sudo make install export PATH=/opt/gcc/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gcc/lib64:/opt/gcc/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH sudo mv /usr/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc.bkup sudo ln -s /opt/gcc/bin/gcc /usr/bin/gcc gcc --version
cd $work_dir # Download and unpack the Ruby 2.5.0 source code wget http://cache.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/2.5/ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz tar zxf ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz cd ruby-2.5.0
# Configure and build Ruby 2.5.0 ./configure make
# Test results and install ruby export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH make test sudo -E make install
# Verify that ruby is available ruby -v gem env
# Correct the gem environment for a standard user export GEM_HOME=/home/test/.gem/ruby export PATH=/home/test/.gem/ruby/bin:$PATH
# Install dependencies sudo yum install -y patch make gcc
# Install Rails via gem gem install rails -v 5.1.5
# Check installed version rails -v | grep 5.1.5
